species.name: porygon2
descriptions: A bizarre item caused this Pokémon to evolve. While it now exhibits many new gestures and expressions, its biology remains inscrutable.
After artificial intelligence was implemented in Porygon2, the Pokémon began using a strange language that only other Porygon2 understand.
AI has been installed in it. It learns various things all on its own, but it even remembers things it doesn’t need to know.
Even though it doesn’t die in the vacuum of space, it can’t move around very well in zero gravity.
For the purposes of planetary development, Porygon was updated with the most cutting-edge technology available.

abilities.name: trace
abilities.effect: Copies an opponent's ability upon entering battle.

abilities.name: download
abilities.effect: Raises the attack stat corresponding to the opponents' weaker defense one stage upon entering battle.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
